channel.title: Erm? Now?
channel.description:
Hi!
I'm not very good with servers, as I'm new.
However, I have been creating my own server, I have downloaded a source, and I can run it fine, my friend can get in.
Now what do I do? How do I make a :: command? I would like a long time helper please. If you'd like you can add me on MSN my address is sladeyyy@hotmail.com or you can contact me on Hamachi.
You may also go on my server, if I'm not already on there, message me on Ham or in the Forums, and I will come on.
Server Port #: 5555 Server IP: 5.94.84.266 Hamachi Netword: VenomScape Hamachi Password: 123
Please help! Thanks. :)
[glow=green,2,300]|||||||[/glow][glow=red,2,300]|||[/glow][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2007, 01:10:34 PM[/size][hr]:\

item.title: Erm? Now?
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

Hi. I see you are new to this forum. Well, there are already tutorials about how to make commands, you just have to search for them useing the search button.
Its not that easy to make new commands at start, first you need to decide what the command will do. Like make yourself an admin, give you an item, etc. (But some commands are already in the sources.)

I cant help much, because I aint good at commands.

I think you’d find this useful too:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


This is a tutorial list about the best tutorials:)

Hope i could help a little. Oh and good luck with your server

Read full topic
